name: The Creeps! 2
description:
Get ready to strategize and protect your precious cookies from all the crazy Creeps! Almost 9.5 years after the launch of the original game, The Creeps! 2 is finally here! Crush the Creeps with all kinds of toy defenses---water blasters, boomerangs, glue bottles, flashlights and more. Plan and choose the best time and place to build and upgrade. Play like a boss and outsmart the Creeps in 40 fantastic puzzling levels!

Wanna bring your battle into the real world?? Try playing The Creeps! 2 in AR (Augmented Reality) today!
